title: Were 10,000 Camels Scheduled to Be Killed in Australia Amid Water Shortages?
subtitle: Multiple websites and social media memes lamented a population-control strategy announced by authorities in South Australia amid drought and extreme heat in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2020, officials in the state of South Australia announced a plan to cull around 10,000 feral camels in response to concerns over public safety and environmental resources.
